description: This file defines the 'NoteDetailScreen' widget for a Flutter app, responsible for displaying detailed information about a note, including options to edit or delete the note, and rendering its content, timestamps, and title.

classes.name: NoteDetailScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays detailed information about a specific note, including title, timestamps, content, and options to edit or delete the note.

methods.name: _confirmDelete
methods.description: A private asynchronous method that prompts the user for note deletion confirmation, and upon confirmation, deletes the note and navigates back.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the note detail screen, displaying the note's information or a not found message.
